---
title: "Intro"
---

These are the help pages for the R package **servevolleyR**, a package to simulate tennis points, games, tiebreaks, sets and matches, using the probability that a server will win a point on their first serve.

### Installation

To install and load the package (devtools must be installed first):

```{r eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("durtal/servevolleyR")
library(servevolleyR)
```

### Functions

A number of functions have `print`, `summary` and `plot` methods, these can be seen on the individual function home pages

function | about | link
---------|-------|------
simPoint | simulate a point | [simPoint](simPoint.html)
simGame | simulate a game | [simGame](simGame.html)
simTiebreak | simulate a tiebreak | [simTiebreak](simTiebreak.html)
simSet | simulate a set | [simSet](simSet.html)
simMatch | simulate a match | [simMatch](simMatch.html)
simGames | simulate many games | [simGames](simGames.html)
simSets | simulate many sets | [simSets](simSets.html)
simMatches | simulate many matches | [simMatches](simMatches.html)
simDf | convert simulated results into a dataframe | [simDf](simDf.html)
